DOC.brief_summary: This study is prospective evaluation of quality of life in men undergoing robotic assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy versus radical retropubic prostatectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in Men Undergoing Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Versus Radical Retropubic Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Preoperatively, enrolled patients will complete questionnaires called EPIC that will ask about urinary, sexual, bowel and hormonal function At 1, 3,6,9 and 12 months after surgery, pateints will complete the questionnaires again. All will be enrolled at Samsung Medical Center
DOC.criteria: Pathologic diagnosis of prostate adenocarcinoma Clinical stage: AJCC (VI) stage T1T2 N0M0 Primary treatment at Samsung Medical Center for prostate cancer using: radical retropubic prostatectomy, robotic prostatectomy Clinical Stage: T3, T4, nodal or distant metastasis All kind of neoadjuvant, concurrent and adjuvant treatment poor health forced a patient into dropout
